channel.title: Comments on: Review: Berlin needs you (but why?)
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Max S.
item.dc:creator: Max S.
item.description: super article, sophia! the idea about operationalizing intercultural openness and inclusivity is key, i think. the only way this goes from idea to practice to 'just the norm' is through government action such as this. makes me proud to be a resident of this city!
item.content:encoded: super article, sophia! the idea about operationalizing intercultural openness and inclusivity is key, i think. the only way this goes from idea to practice to ‘just the norm’ is through government action such as this. makes me proud to be a resident of this city!
